fields.name: Introduction
fields.description: Just shows the word and an icon to click the speaker.

fields.name: Sight Match
fields.description: Show the word above and they have to click the word in a group below. First click either pass or fail.

fields.name: Sight Cross
fields.description: Two lists of words, click one, then click the other. If wrong, both get crossed out red.

fields.name: Sight Spell
fields.description: Show the word above and they have to type in characters to match the spelling.

fields.name: Sight Search
fields.description: Basic word search. Student clicks letters, circling in row. When circle matches, word is crossed out. Indifferent button to give up.

fields.name: Sound Match
fields.description: Play the sound (and button to replay), pick from a list.

fields.name: Sound Cross
fields.description: Line of speakers and line of words.  Play the speaker, match the words.

fields.name: Sound Spell
fields.description: Show the word above and they have to type in characters to match the spelling.

fields.name: Sound Search
fields.description: Basic word search. List of speakers for words to search for. Student clicks letters, circling in row. When circle matches, word is green. Indifferent button to give up.
